text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The criterion requires the response to explain rules for professional guardian compensation (reimbursement of expenses, judicially fixed indemnity, paid from estate, etc.). Section 4.3, titled 'Remuneration,' explicitly covers this by stating the guardian 'may be paid a *compenso* approved by the judge,' that the amount is 'proportional to the workload,' that family members may have fees waived, and that compensation is 'subject to tax (IRPEF) like any other professional income.' This directly addresses the required elements of compensation rules.", "criterion_id": "a7bd8154-0ac2-45ce-b540-bb8bdad7fc89"}
